1:
--------------------
Text: Illicit drug use in Australia:  Illicit drugs include illegal drugs (such as cannabis, opiates, and certain types of stimulants), pharmaceutical drugs (such as pain-killers and tranquillisers) when used for non-medical purposes, and other substances used inappropriately (such as inhalants).
Triplets:<Illicit drug use
